verses.verse: A Psalm of David, to bring to remembrance. O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, rebuke <S%H3198><s%> me not in thy wrath <S%H2534><s%>; Neither chasten <S%H3256><s%> me in thy hot displeasure <S%H2534><s%>.
For thine arrows <S%H2671><s%> stick fast <S%H5181><s%> in me <S%H3027><s%>, And thy hand presseth me sore <S%H5181><s%>.

There is no soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh <S%H1320><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of thine indignation <S%H2195><s%>; Neither is there any health <S%H7965><s%> in my bones <S%H6106><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of my sin <S%H2403><s%>.
For mine iniquities <S%H5771><s%> are gone over <S%H5674><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%>: As a heavy <S%H3515><s%> burden <S%H4853><s%> they are too heavy for me <S%H3513><s%>.
My wounds <S%H2250><s%> are loathsome <S%H887><s%> and corrupt <S%H4743><s%>, Because <S%H6440><s%> of my foolishness <S%H200><s%>.
I am pained <S%H5753><s%> and bowed down <S%H7817><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>; I go <S%H1980><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%> all the day long <S%H3117><s%>.
For my loins <S%H3689><s%> are filled <S%H4390><s%> with burning <S%H7033><s%>; And there is no soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
I am faint <S%H6313><s%> and sore <S%H3966><s%> bruised <S%H1794><s%>: I have groaned <S%H7580><s%> by reason of the disquietness <S%H5100><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, all my desire <S%H8378><s%> is before thee <S%H585><s%>; And my groaning is not hid from thee <S%H5641><s%>.

My heart <S%H3820><s%> throbbeth <S%H5503><s%>, my strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H5800><s%> me <S%H216><s%>: As for the light of mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, it <S%H1992><s%> also is gone from me <S%H369><s%>.
My lovers <S%H157><s%> and my friends <S%H7453><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> aloof from <S%H5048><s%> my plague <S%H5061><s%>; And my kinsmen <S%H7138><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>.

They also that seek <S%H1245><s%> after my life <S%H5315><s%> lay snares <S%H5367><s%> for me <S%H1875><s%>; And they that seek my hurt <S%H7451><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> mischievous things <S%H1942><s%>, And meditate <S%H1897><s%> deceits <S%H4820><s%> all the day long <S%H3117><s%>.
But I <S%H2795><s%>, as a deaf man <S%H8085><s%>, hear not <S%H483><s%>; And I am as a dumb man that openeth <S%H6605><s%> not his mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Yea <S%H376><s%>, I am as a man that heareth <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H6310><s%>, And in whose mouth are no reproofs <S%H8433><s%>.
For in thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, do I hope <S%H3176><s%>: Thou wilt answer <S%H6030><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>.
For I said <S%H559><s%>, Lest they rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over me <S%H7272><s%>: When my foot slippeth <S%H4131><s%>, they magnify themselves against me <S%H1431><s%>.
For I am ready <S%H3559><s%> to fall <S%H6761><s%>, And my sorrow <S%H4341><s%> is continually before me <S%H8548><s%>.
For I will declare <S%H5046><s%> mine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; I will be sorry <S%H1672><s%> for my sin <S%H2403><s%>.
But mine enemies <S%H341><s%> are lively <S%H2416><s%>, and are strong <S%H6105><s%>; And they that hate <S%H8130><s%> me wrongfully <S%H8267><s%> are multiplied <S%H7231><s%>.
They also that render <S%H7999><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%> Are adversaries <S%H7853><s%> unto me <S%H7291><s%>, because I follow the thing that is good <S%H2896><s%>.
Forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah: O my God <S%H430><s%>, be not far from me <S%H7368><s%>.
Make haste <S%H2363><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me <S%H136><s%>, O Lord, my salvation <S%H8668><s%>.
